TAKE A TRIP ON THE REAL SUPERHIGHWAY.

SHARE YOUR PASSION.

More than 90% of automotive innovations are based on electronics and software. That's why creative freedom and lateral thinking are so important in the pursuit of truly new solutions. Naturally, this includes flexible working models, so that our IT specialists are free to go in unconventional directions.

BMW Group offers a wide portfolio of connected products and apps in our digital cars and related customer touchpoints. Most of those products and apps rely on cloud-based backend services that are developed and operated by our organizational unit. Our cloud-based Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solutions enable product teams within our organization to develop and operate Connected Drive backend services. These solutions include container platforms to operate microservices at scale, a CI/CD platform, a central logging platform and an AI platform. Our dynamic team in Munich consisting of Product Owners, Cloud Architects and Cloud Engineers is extended by globally distributed DevOps teams with external partners.

What awaits you?

You design, build, and operate cloud-based solutions in our PaaS based on state-of-the art technology (e.g., AWS, Terraform, Kubernetes).
You architect new concepts (e.g., for a decentralized API Gateway) to maintain the scalability and reliability of our PaaS services.
You guide and steer the technical implementation of production solutions with the DevOps teams of our external partners.
You collaborate with the ConnectedDrive product teams to align on technical requirements.
You ensure the availability of our cloud services by contributing to our rotating 24x7 on-call duty.
You are member of an innovative team of cloud experts which drives innovation of our digital products and services.


What should you bring along?

University degree in Computer Science or a comparable field of study.
At least 3 years as a professional Cloud/DevOps Engineer.
In-depth knowledge about Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, Network Technology, API Gateway solutions (preferably Kong) and Cloud security.
Advanced knowledge in at least one public cloud (preferably AWS).
Excitement for new cloud-native technologies.
Experience in agile software development.
Readiness for occasional traveling (<20%), e.g., for face-to-face meetings with our international DevOps teams.
Excellent English skills, German skills are an advantage.


You enjoy working in an international team and are passionate about software quality? Apply now!

Note: Please apply exclusively online via our career portal. Applications via other channels (esp. email) cannot be considered.

What do we offer?

30 days of holiday.
Attractive remuneration.
BMW & MINI promotions.
Career development.
Flexible organisation of working times.
High Work-Life Balance.
Mobility offers.
And many other benefits - see bmw.jobs/benefits

Equal opportunities are a particular concern for us, and the equal treatment of applicants and employees is a fundamental principle of our corporate policy. That is why our recruiting decisions are also based on personality, experience and skills.

Dein Aufgabenbereich




Du bist verantwortlich der Cloud Infrastruktur für Services bei den Kunden zu optimieren und dies bereitzustellen. Der Fokus liegt auf AWS Cloud Umgebungen
Mit Team Lösungen übernimmst du der Design und Implementation von der Cloud Applikationsbetrieb bei Kunden.
Die Automatisierung und Optimierung von Arbeitsabläufe und Prozesse schaffst du täglich.
Die operative Störungen in klassischer Infrastruktur sowie auch in der Cloud Umgebung werden von dir analysiert und ausgelöst.
Bei Bedarf für Änderungen würdest du bearbeitest du Änderungsanforderungen und führst Wartungsarbeiten durch.
Du wirst zusammen mit dem Vertriebsteam bei der Angebotserstellung und Kalkulation mitwirken.
Du wirst die internen Mitarbeitern sowie den Kunden-Projektleiter bei allen technischen Aufgaben und Problemen unterstützen.

Du hast eine abgeschlossene Ausbildung zum Fachinformatiker für Systemintegration oder vergleichbares Studium/Ausbildung
Du hast gute Linux-Kenntnisse und Grundlagen von SQL
Du bringst Kenntnisse im Cloud Infrastructure Management mit
Du hast bereits Erfahrung mit Infrastructure as Code (IaC) gesammelt
Du kennst dich mit Container Plattformen sowie den Installation/Administration davon aus (z.B. Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift, usw.)
Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse sind selbstverständlich
